timeline.bodyText: return node instanceof FilterNode && ((FilterNode) node).getSource() instanceof TableScanNode;

replies.bodyText: I found it has been done in #4300
replies.author: Lewuathe

timeline.message:
Eliminate the redundant control flow

Optimizer module have several unnecessary if statement inside. We can
simplify such control flows by simply eliminating them.
